title: LocalContent.ai Prompt Template Schema
description: Schema for validating LocalContent.ai prompt template YAML files.

name.description: Unique name for the prompt template.

description.description: A brief description of what this prompt template does.

target_content_type.description: The type of content this prompt is designed to generate (e.g., 'website_description', 'social_post', 'email_campaign').

industry.description: The target industry for this prompt (e.g., 'Landscapers', 'HVAC', 'Restaurants', 'General').

content_goal.description: The primary goal of the content generated by this prompt.

keywords_to_inject.description: An array of keywords recommended for injection into the generated content.

tone.description: The desired tone of the generated content (e.g., 'professional', 'friendly', 'authoritative', 'conversational').

guidelines.description: Detailed instructions for the AI on how to generate the content.

example_prompt.description: A concrete example of a prompt that would use these guidelines.

example_output.description: An example of the desired output based on the example_prompt.

variables.description: Optional: A list of variables that can be used within the prompt template.

description.description: A description of what the variable represents.

default.description: An optional default value for the variable.

integrations.description: Optional: Details about external integrations (e.g., keyword providers).
